articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Niger: ECOWAS finalizes potential military intervention plan - DW (English)
articles.description: West African military chiefs say they have drawn up plans to put down the coup in Niger. Regional leaders are still hoping to find a diplomatic solution.
articles.content:
Defense chiefs of the West African regional group, ECOWAS, on Friday, agreed on a plan for intervention in Niger if its coup leaders do not restore constitutional order.
Abdel-Fatau Musah, ECOWAS co… [+3177 chars]
